passives.name: Bring It Down
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal {{as|{{rd|150 + (200-150)/10*(x-1) for 13|150*0.8 + (200*0.8-150*0.8)/10*(x-1) for 13|levels=1;9 to 20|pp=true}} '''bonus''' physical damage|physical damage}} on-hit, increased by {{pp|0 to 75 by 5|0 to 100|key=%|color=health|type=target's '''missing''' health|key1=%}}, for up to {{as|{{rd|150*1.75 + (200*1.75-150*1.75)/10*(x-1) for 13|150*0.8*1.75 + (200*0.8*1.75-150*0.8*1.75)/10*(x-1) for 13|levels=1;9 to 20|pp=true}} '''bonus''' physical damage|physical damage}}.

effects_structured.raw: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks

At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal {{as {{rd 150 + (200-150)/10*(x-1) for 13 150*0.8 + (200*0.8-150*0.8)/10*(x-1) for 13 levels=1;9 to 20 pp=true}} '''bonus''' physical damage physical damage}} on-hit, increased by {{pp 0 to 75 by 5 0 to 100 key=% color=health type=target's '''missing''' health key1=%}}, for up to {{as {{rd 150*1.75 + (200*1.75-150*1.75)/10*(x-1) for 13 150*0.8*1.75 + (200*0.8*1.75-150*0.8*1.75)/10*(x-1) for 13 levels=1;9 to 20 pp=true}} '''bonus''' physical damage physical damage}}.
